awd_titl_txt: Modernization of Undergraduate Physical Chemistry Laboratory
awd_abstract_narration: Gannon University is modernizing the one year undergraduate                physical chemistry laboratory.  The laboratory schedule is                      revised to include a greater emphasis on modern instrumentation                 and laboratory techniques.  New experiments include the                         introduction of basic electronics, the thermal equation of state                and critical points, heat capacity ratio of gases, Raman                        spectroscopy, physical adsorption of gases and magnetic                         susceptibilities.  In addition, the equipment is used in                        undergraduate research.                                                                                                                                         The institution is matching the NSF grant with an equal amount                  of funds.
